sentence: Beach-Ferrara is seeking to oust Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.), while Flowers is vying to replace Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.).
title: House Dems try to ward off GOP attacks on crime

sentence: They're running out of things to throw at me... Share your most embarrassing vacay pics in the repliesg??https://t.co/YicRk0Albu Madison Cawthorn (@CawthornforNC) April 22, 2022 9 days ago: According to reporting from the local site Smoky Mountain News, Lisa Wiggins, a former caseworker and aide to the lawmaker, filed a workplace complaint against the congressman claiming that Cawthorn denied her leave when two family members passed away within the same week.
title: A new Democratic super PAC is endorsing 11 more candidates and spending $10 million in primary contests.

sentence: Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn simply cannot keep it together right now.

title: Madison Cawthorn Is Having a Hell of a Week
